api_list.name: List the published landing pages
api_list.description: Returns the list of published landing pages of the user.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://send-sms4.p.rapidapi.com/API/v1.0/REST/landings"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "send-sms4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

print(response.json())

api_list.name: List contacts groups
api_list.description: Returns the list of existing contacts groups, paginated.

optional_parameters.name: fax
optional_parameters.description: The Fax number of the contact

api_list.name: Get the MO received messages
api_list.description: This feature is available only for French customers!. Returns a list (limited to max. 100 entries) of MO messages received for the give type which could be STOP or CONTACT or OTHER; type is a mandatory parameter, the other are optional.

api_list.name: Get the received SMS messages after a specified message.
api_list.description: Returns a list (limited to max. 100 entries) of SMS messages received after the given SMS message ID id_message, for the given SIM id_sim.

required_parameters.name: id_sim
required_parameters.description: The phone number where you enabled the service of reception, in international format (+393471234567 or 00393471234567). If no SIM is specified, returns the new messages for all enabled SIMs. It is possible to specify more numbers, separated by comma

api_list.name: Get the received SMS messages for one or more specific SIMs
api_list.description: Get the paginated list of received SMS messages.

required_parameters.name: id_sim
required_parameters.description: The phone number where you enabled the service of reception, in international format (+393471234567 or 00393471234567). If no SIM is specified, returns the new messages for all enabled SIMs. It is possible to specify more numbers, separated by comma

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://send-sms4.p.rapidapi.comAPI/v1.0/REST/srsmshistory/All SIMs"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "send-sms4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://send-sms4.p.rapidapi.comAPI/v1.0/REST/srsmshistory/{id_sim}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "send-sms4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get new received messages for all SIMs
api_list.description: Returns the list of received messages on the given sim_id since the last call of this method, or the beginning of time if it’s the first call. The list is limited to max. 100 entries.

api_list.name: Get list of campaigns by statuses
api_list.description: Get list of campaigns by statuses. If statuses is not specified by default return only ACTIVE campaign.

required_parameters.name: reply_to
required_parameters.description: The email to be used for the ‘reply_to’ email field

api_list.name: User status
api_list.description: Used to retrieve the services status of the user identified by the id.

optional_parameters.name: getMoney
optional_parameters.description: Add user current money to response

api_list.name: Get a contact
api_list.description: Get a contact’s details

api_list.name: List contact’s custom fields
api_list.description: Returns the list of user’s defined custom fields

optional_parameters.name: address
optional_parameters.description: The address of the contact

optional_parameters.name: surname
optional_parameters.description: The last name of the contact

optional_parameters.name: fax
optional_parameters.description: The Fax number of the contact

optional_parameters.name: phoneNumber
optional_parameters.description: The phone number of the contact

optional_parameters.name: city
optional_parameters.description: The city of the contact

optional_parameters.name: zip
optional_parameters.description: The ZIP code of the contact

optional_parameters.name: birthdate
optional_parameters.description: The birth date of the contact  [ddMMyy, yyyyMMdd, ddMMyyHHmm, yyyyMMddHHmmss, yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm, yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm.0]

optional_parameters.name: gender
optional_parameters.description: The gender of the contact

optional_parameters.name: groupIds
optional_parameters.description: The groups (Ids) in which the contact will be added

optional_parameters.name: province
optional_parameters.description: The province of the contact

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: The first name of the contact

optional_parameters.name: SendOptIn
optional_parameters.description: Send an Opt-In email to the contact’s email

api_list.name: Get the list of subaccounts
api_list.description: Returns the list of subaccounts of the authenticated user.

required_parameters.name: passwd
required_parameters.description: The subaccount password (min 8 chars, max 16 chars)

api_list.description: Returns the paginated list of purchases made by a subaccount. Caller must be a superaccount.

required_parameters.name: passwd
required_parameters.description: The subaccount password (min 8 chars, max 16 chars)

api_list.name: Authenticate using a user token

api_list.name: Get all aliases
api_list.description: Returns a paginated list of the user’s TPOA aliases.

required_parameters.name: company-name
required_parameters.description: The name of company associated to this alias

required_parameters.name: contact-name
required_parameters.description: The name of physical person rappresenting the company

required_parameters.name: alias
required_parameters.description: The sender that will be shown on SMS

required_parameters.name: contact-surname
required_parameters.description: The surname of physical person rappresenting the company

required_parameters.name: contact-type
required_parameters.description: The type of contact referred to contact-info

api_list.name: Get subaccount available credits

required_parameters.name: passwd
required_parameters.description: The subaccount password (min 8 chars, max 16 chars)

api_list.description: Returns the list of subaccounts of the authenticated user.

required_parameters.name: passwd
required_parameters.description: The subaccount password (min 8 chars, max 16 chars)

required_parameters.name: id_sim
required_parameters.description: The phone number where you enabled the service of reception, in international format (+393471234567 or 00393471234567). If no SIM is specified, returns the new messages for all enabled SIMs. It is possible to specify more numbers, separated by comma

api_list.name: Retrieve list of phone numbers in blacklist
api_list.description: Retrieve the paginated list of Phone numbers in SMS Blacklist

optional_parameters.name: from
optional_parameters.description: Return results from the given date

optional_parameters.name: pageSize
optional_parameters.description: The number of results in a page

optional_parameters.name: to
optional_parameters.description: Return results up to the given date

optional_parameters.name: origins
optional_parameters.description: List of origins(API, WEB, STOPSMS) separated by ‘,’ used for filter the results

optional_parameters.name: number
optional_parameters.description: Return results that contains this phone number or part of it.

optional_parameters.name: pageNumber
optional_parameters.description: Return the given results page

optional_parameters.name: timezone
optional_parameters.description: Optional timezone applied to from or to dates

api_list.name: Get SMS message state
api_list.description: Get informations on the SMS delivery status of the given order_id.

api_list.name: Get a specific alias
api_list.description: Returns the data of the given TPOA Alias ID.
